title: Promising never to repeat a particular mistake
context: Assure someone that you will not do the bad thing again.

content.bestLine: I'll never do that again, I promise

neutral.text: You can trust me on this
It's not going to happen again

informal.text: My bad, it won't happen again
I'm really sorry, it was a mistake
I'll make it right, I promise

formal.text: I assure you, it won't happen again
That incident was an isolated mistake
I am committed to preventing similar errors
You have my word, it won't recur

patterns.meaning: assurance of not repeating a mistake

patterns.template: I've [learned/from] my mistake and it won't happen again
patterns.meaning: acknowledgment of mistake and assurance of improvement

dialogs.description: Apology and assurance in a personal relationship

lines.speaker: Person A
lines.text: I'm really sorry for what I did

lines.speaker: Person B
lines.text: Just make sure it doesn't happen again

lines.speaker: Person A
lines.text: I promise it won't, I've learned from my mistake
